prompt: Centered, print-ready isolated sports emblem artwork on a vibrant hot pink solid background. MUST include: thick black vector-style outline around the isolated elements (text and graphics) ONLY. Do NOT add a square frame or border around the entire image. Isolated artwork only; no garment, no mockup, no fabric, no shadows. A bold, centered circular badge composition featuring a realistic vector volleyball at center with stylized energetic splashing ocean waves beneath, small decorative stars and dot speckles inside the badge, and subtle ink-splash texture for character while keeping overall print-clean. Typography and layout: TEXT Hungarian: "VÍZILABDA" (arched top) "FINOM SPORT" (small centered banner across waves) "DURVA EMBEREKNEK" (large bold baseline). Use strong, condensed uppercase sans-serif for all text with slight vintage distress on letterforms for a rugged sport look; the top word arched to follow the badge curve, the middle phrase set in a compact horizontal ribbon/banner across the lower part of the ball and waves, the bottom line large and dominant, tightly tracked. Colors: primary artwork in solid white with royal blue accents in the waves, all isolated graphic shapes and text surrounded by a consistent thick black vector outline to read cleanly on the hot pink background. Clean vector shapes, sharp edges, flat colors (no photorealistic shading), scalable for print, centered composition, high-contrast legibility.
negative_prompt: no mockup, no garment, no fabric texture, no shadows, no models, no photo, no background clutter, no frame, t-shirt mockup, hoodie mockup, garment, fabric texture, wrinkles, folds, shadows, photo, model, background scene, studio lighting

debug.notes: Top arch reads clearly as 'VÍZILABDA' with accent on Í; middle small ribbon text reads 'FINOM SPORT'; bottom large text reads 'DURVA EMBEREKNEK'. All three lines are distinct and legible in the reference image.
